Name: Unforgettable Dishes
Description: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...
QuestDesc: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me explain our job today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This chapter recounts how the protagonist met their destined companions for the first time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It goes: "The most reliable way to find you a reliable teammate is not through good vibes but a good fight."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "And when you're concerned about mutual faith, ask for a bowl of hot soup when you suffer hunger and cold in the wilderness."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: During such a hard time, someone offered a bowl of hot soup to our protagonist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I would remember it for the rest of my life if I were the protagonist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What kind of food do you think would work best in such a scenario, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I didn't know you would like that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, we don't really have many choices.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, please pick a suitable dish as a reference for our dev team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It smells good... I'll hand it over to the dev team right now. Thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It should be the ideal food to signify their first encounter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time passed while Maqi was away to hand over the item...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. That wraps up today's work!

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you find these guys familiar?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I don't know them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, let's call it a day. See you tomorrow, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, Panhua's Restaurant is definitely one of the must-haves in Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you need to learn about foods, I suggest you ask for Panhua's advice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though I've never read the book, the story certainly feels close to home!

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember back when I was young and my family was struggling to make ends meet, I could nibble on a plain flatbread that the kind old man of the village gave me to get me through the day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps it was these days that nurtured my love for cooking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What could be happier than to please your guests with all your cooking skills?

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of which, here is a specialty I made just now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's called Jinzhou Stew, General Jiyan's favorite food of all time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's also a taste from their childhood for many in Jinzhou

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, right? A stew of meat and vegetables always serves the best when you're hungry!

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, don't forget your urgent errands. Let's continue our food conversation next time. I still have a few dishes to serve.

Dialogues.Speaker: Panhua
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can drop by for a slow enjoyable meal when available. I'll cook for you!
